Many times when running the debugger in M7 I get the following exception when 
trying to display the Variables view:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.runtime 4 2 Mar 11, 2004 15:50:38.921
!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Debug".
!STACK 0
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1

(LazyModelPresentation.java:196)

(LazyModelPresentation.java:121)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.DelegatingModelPresentation.getText

	at
